metadata.title: CVE-2021-31260 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The MergeTrack function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file in the MP4Boxcommand.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
